description: The lab is now open! We look forward to exciting science in the future!
Syed Rahman joins the lab as a Post Doctoral Fellow
Hanxi Xiao joins the lab as a Master's Student
Swapnil Keshari joins the lab as a PhD student from CPCB Program
Prabal Chhibbar joins the lab as a PhD student from ISB Program
Trirupa Chakraborty joins the lab as a PhD student from ISB Program

Javad Rahimikollu gradutes the lab as Dr. Javad Rahimikollu. We wish him best in his next endeavor! Upwards and Onwards!
